name: 黃琮昇
objective:
本課程提供學生親自動手的智能系統設計與實踐規劃。課程由兩個主要部分構成，包括講座及實作實踐課程。
課程共計 18 周將分為以下三個階段: 
第一階段為大師班系列，由臺北科技大學及麻省理工學院的教授和相關行業的專家擔任主講人。
第二階段將著重於基礎製造知識，如 CAD、電腦數值控制、3D 列印、雷射切割、PCB 設計與實做、傳感器與致動器、嵌入式處理器、有線和無線通信。
第三階段將結合前階段所習技能致力於原型設計。強調學習如何使用這些工具及其工作原理。
課程最後將以期末發表會展示學習成果。
The course provides a hands-on introduction to the resources for designing and fabricating smart systems. The course consists of two major portions, including lecture and hands-on lab session. The course will be divided into the following three stages. The course will finish with a final presentation and demo session as final exam.
schedule:
Week 1: Lecture Introduction and Grouping (課程介紹與分組)
Week 2: Speech I  (大師課 I)
Week 3: Speech II (大師課 II)
Week 4: Wireless Communication (無線通訊)
Week 5: Information Security   (資訊安全)
Week 6: Work Session I   (構思 I)
Week 7: Work Session II  (構思 II)
Week 8: Milestone Report (期中報告)
Week 9: Design Tools/GitHub (數位工具的運用)
Week 10: 3D Printing     (3D 列印)
Week 11: Laser Cutting/Water Jet Cutting/Semi-automatic Devices (雷切，水刀，半自動化設備)
Week 12: Microcontroller (微處理機)
Week 13: Circuit Design/PCB Board Development (電路設計，電路板製作)
Week 14: Sensor and Actuator (感應器與致動器的控制與操作)
Week 15: Prototyping I   (製作 I)
Week 16: Prototyping II  (製作 II)
Week 17: Prototyping III (製作 III)
Week 18: Final Demonstration (期末展示)
scorePolicy:
Milestone Report (期中報告): 10%,
Final Demonstration (期末展示): 50%,
Participation (課堂表現): 30%,
Attendance (出席率): 10%.
